{{also|别来无恙}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=别来无恙|type=112}}

===Etymology===
Literally: [You] lack ([[無]]) sickness ([[恙]]) since ([[來]]) [we last] parted ([[別]]).

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=bié lái wúyàng
|c=bit4 loi4 mou4 joeng6
|cat=intj
}}

===Interjection===
{{zh-interj}}

# {{lb|zh|idiomatic}} You're looking as healthy as ever, nice to see you again.
# {{lb|zh|idiomatic}} (in correspondence) I hope all is well since we last spoke.

[[zh:別來無恙]]
